P0-TEST-001.title: Critical Fix: Async/await chain broken in SMD startup
P0-TEST-001.description: Fix WebSocket manager initialization returning coroutine instead of instance
P0-TEST-001.business_impact: Complete system startup failure preventing user access
remediation_plan: Fix async/await chain in SMD startup sequence
Ensure WebSocket manager is properly awaited
Add health check validation for WebSocket manager
validation_steps: Confirm WebSocket manager is properly instantiated
Check health checks pass for all critical services
Test WebSocket events work after startup
execution_notes: 2025-09-08T13:45:34.163500: Fixed async/await chain - startup now completes successfully
recurrence_prevention: Added startup integration tests for async/await patterns
Implemented linting rules to catch coroutine vs. instance errors
Enhanced health check error reporting with specific diagnostics
